 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָהַל‎</span>] **verb** ==neigh, cry shrilly== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***neigh***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[Esth.8.15|Esth 8:15]] = Biblical Hebrew); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽהֲלָה‎</span> [[Esth.8.15|Esth 8:15]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽהֲלוּ‎</span> [[Isa.24.14|Isa 24:14]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְהָ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Jer.5.8|Jer 5:8]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תצהלי‎</span> [[Jer.50.11|Jer 50:11]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּצְהֲלוּ‎</span> and so [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]]; ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַהֲלִי‎</span> [[Isa.10.30|Isa 10:30]] +; masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַהֲלוּ‎</span> [[Jer.31.7|Jer 31:7]] — 

**1.** ***neigh***, of men under figure of stallions; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> ***unto*** (in desire) [[Jer.5.8|Jer 5:8]], of profligate Judaeans; absolute [[Jer.50.11|Jer 50:11]] of arrogant Chaldeans. 

**2.** ***cry shrilly***, in distress [[Isa.10.30|Isa 10:30]] (c. adverb accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺלֵךְ‎</span>); usually joy, praise (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָנַן‎</span>) [[Isa.12.6|Isa 12:6]]; [[Isa.54.1|Isa 54:1]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> ***at, over***, [[Jer.31.7|Jer 31:7]]; [[Isa.24.14|Isa 24:14]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמֵ֑חָה‎</span> [[Esth.8.15|Esth 8:15]]. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָהַל‎</span>] **verb Hiph\`il** ==make shining== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (rare); \|\| form of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צהר‎</span>, denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צהרים‎</span>); — ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַצְהִיל פָּנִים מִשָּׁ֑מֶן‎</span> [[Ps.104.15|Ps 104:15]].
